summary: In Shanghai, China in the 1940s, a wannabe gangster aspires to join the notorious "Axe Gang" while residents of a housing complex exhibit extraordinary powers in defending their turf.
cast: Stephen Chow|Xiaogang Feng|Wah Yuen|Zhihua Dong|Danny Kwok-Kwan Chan|Tze-Chung Lam|Siu-Lung Leung|Qiu Yuen|Kai-Man Tin|Kang Xi Jia|Hark-On Fung|Shengyi Huang|Suet Lam|Cheung-Yan Yuen|Chi Ling Chiu|Xing Yu|Yibai Zhang|Si Lu Ren|Xiaolong Ding|Ming Ming Zhang|Oliver Wong|Kai Shi Chen|Wellson Chin|Wen Hui He|David Hung|Billy Ma|Hao Tian Yuan|Min-Hun Fung|Nang Yang|Chao Xia Liu|Jessica Gee-George
title: Kung Fu sion
